708620.name: Realities - Cologne Cathedral
708620.description:
Go on an exclusive tour through a marvel of Gothic architecture, uncover stories from it's eventful history and explore parts of this UNESCO World Heritage Site that are off limits for normal visitors! We partnered up with German public-broadcasting institution WDR to bring one of Germany's most iconic landmarks into VR - the Cologne Cathedral.

Explore six locations from the impressive foundation underground all the way to the lofty height and wonderful panorama of the central tower and learn more about the Cathedral with the audio flyers available in English & German.

Want more? Be sure to check out the entire cross media projects website on the right!
708620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
